scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.server: cd backend/bin && npm i && npm start
scripts.client: cd frontend && npm i && npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build && cp -r build ../backend/
